review: Excellent device.  I can see anything from my Galaxy S5 on my 55" plasma TV.  Much easier to use YouTube or any of the other apps using my phone than with the awkward interfaces my TV and blu-ray provide for their apps.  Extremely easy to connect and get up and running. Note, with the S5 you need to go to Settings|Wifi|Advanced (from the dropdown, top right)) and turn Smart network switch to OFF in order to complete the setup.  You will be able to re-enable after initial set-up.
author: A-Han The HR King

review: This little gadget is a good buy!  It was a bit challenging at first to get it to sync, but once it did, it works great.
author: Elsa Gatto

review: Works well most of the time, and I like the fact that you can cast pretty much any content you want.  I end up preferring the Roku stick because it has a remote, and I don't need a tablet or laptop to cast what I want to watch.
author: Michael Allgaier

review: Functionality is limited, I only able to watch some content from youtube and, most of the stuff will not play at all.
author: Mikhail Chibel
